task.question: According to Jonathan, son of Abiathar, who made Solomon king (1 Kgs 1:43)?
What was the noise Adonijah and his guests heard (1 Kgs 1:45)?
Who said, “May your God make Solomon’s name more famous than yours” (1 Kgs 1:47)?
What was the response of Adonijah’s guests when they heard David had made Solomon king (1 Kgs 1:49)?

choices.choice: They put on their swords preparing to attack
They grabbed Adonijah and killed him
They fled to the spring at En Rogel

task.question: When Solomon was made king why did David praise God (1 Kgs 1:48)?

choices.choice: That God had raised up a king in Israel
That God had allowed him to see his successor
That God had given Solomon such great wisdom
That God had kept his promise to David by giving him a successor

task.answer: That God had allowed him to see his successor

task.question: Where did the king bow and worship when Solomon was made king (1 Kgs 1:48)?
What did Adonijah do when he heard Solomon had become king (1 Kgs 1:50)?

choices.choice: Took hold of the horns of the altar

task.answer: Took hold of the horns of the altar

task.question: What did Adonijah fear would happen to him (1 Kgs 1:51)?

choices.choice: He would be put to death by the sword
He would be exiled from the land
He would be disgraced in the eyes of Israel
He would be tortured and left for dead

task.answer: He would be put to death by the sword

task.question: If Adonijah showed himself to be a worthy man, what did Solomon say would happen to him (1 Kgs 1:52)?

choices.choice: He would also come to rule over a people
His former wealth and honor would be restored to him
The LORD would pour out his blessings upon him
Not a hair of his head would fall to the ground

task.answer: Not a hair of his head would fall to the ground

task.question: Where did Solomon send Adonijah after he came down from grabbing onto the hors of the altar? (1 Kgs 1:53)?

choices.choice: Exiled out of the city gate
